room_title: Escape room "Pirate Adventure" by Escape Room Family in Cincinnati
room_description: This swashbuckling pirate adventure consists of two rooms: Pirate Ship and Pirate Island. Players will spend 30 minutes in the first Pirate room solving puzzles and discovering treasures, take a break, and then go into a completely different Pirate-themed room with unique puzzles and treasures. The adventure will see players board a Pirate Ship and work together to uncover the ship’s secret treasures. They will also explore the mysteries and puzzles of Pirate Island… rumored to hold treasures beyond belief.
